page.title: 16LEISURE
page.content: Most people seem to watch television in their spare time, but some children actually get up and do something. Adam likes fixing bikes, Andrew likes reading old books. Sarah, like many others collect things like rubbers or stickers. Anthony likes drawing, reading and coin collecting. He draws because he likes designing things. William reads and draws pictures of palaces and castles. "i design houses because you can do them anywhere. I tidy up my room only when my mum is helping because I am very lazy but I know that it looks good when we have done it. I also collect marbles, they look nice when you hold them up to the light and look through them."
